title: Love Spark: The Protector
description: We left our galaxy in search of a place to call home.Finally, we find a place, but we are not alone. It belongs to someone else.; an ancient being with telepathic abilities and he has chosen me as his conduit.Now left on the planet with him, I can't run away from the feelings he inspires within me. Do I even want to?When he suggests that I be his woman in every sense of the word, how can I refuse when he touches the deepest part of my psyche?The biggest obstacle to my happiness are my people. What will they do when they learn of my betrayal?
author: Ondia Morris
